Text: We would seed if it wasn't compressed and split for no reason.. That's the reason why VTV has better seeded torrents
Stop moaning this is the only copy - better than nothing! Hopefully someone will upload the Colbert report as tpb went down last night and VTV has probably gone to bed.

Although I don't have any torrents myself and I do appreciate others who make these videos available, still, it would be so much better if they were not in compressed form. 

And stop telling people not to complain. Yes we know it is free etc but without people voicing their opinions then how would anything improve?
Thanks for letting me know to stay away from SceneTime.
